Here update from [ITLDC](http://itldc.com/en/):

First, thank you for your feedback. Also I want to provide link to [LowEndBox ITLDC's Review](http://lowendbox.com/blog/itldc-com-4-80month-512mb-ssd-kvm-vps-in-kharkov-amsterdam-or-los-angeles/) by *Maarten Kossen*. Thanks for amazing article :)

As you know, [SysAdmin's Day](http://sysadminday.com/) is coming. Here the our **special limited promotion** to all sysadmins:

* **50% recurring discount** to any [SSD VDS](http://itldc.com/en/vds/) with **SYSADMINDAY** promocode. For example,  KVM-based VDS512 in NL, US or UA with IPv4+IPv6 and instant setup will be yours just for €1,75/$2,4 per month (regular price - €3,5/$4,79). 

* **33% recurring discount** to all [dedicated servers](http://itldc.com/en/dedicated/). Promocode the same. For example, UA-i5-8 (Intel Core i5/8Gb/2x500/unlimited bandwidth) available just for €32,83/$44,65 per month.

Hurry up - promocode active till July,31 23:59 UTC :)

All VDS and dedicated server comes with instant automatic setup. You need just select your desired operating system and wait few minutes. We supports any popular Linux distros and, of course, FreeBSD. Also you can perform manual OS install using VNC console - even with your own ISO, just ask our support team for assistance.

Our previous topic on LET [here](http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/28873/nl-us-ua-itldc-com-kvm-vds-with-ssd-from-3-83-and-server-from-41-let-specials).
